O

onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddModifyCustomerController
The onActionCancel method is an event handler that allows users to cancel adding or updating a customer and returning to the main view.
onActionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddModifyCustomerController
The onActionSave method is an event handler that saves a new customer or updates an existing customer.
onAddNewAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This event handler method redirects the user to the Add Appointment view defined by AddModifyAppointment.fxml when the Add Appointment button is clicked.
onAddNewCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This event handler method redirects the user to the Add Customer view defined by AddModifyCustomer.fxml, when the Add Customer button is clicked.
onAddUpdate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddModifyAppointmentController
This method is an event handler that either adds a new appointment or updates an existing appointment.
onCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddModifyAppointmentController
This method sends the user back to the Main View when the cancel button is clicked.
onCountrySelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddModifyCustomerController
The onCountrySelected method is an event handler that sets the firstLevelComboBox with First Level Divisions from the selected country.
onDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This event handler method deletes the appointment that has been selected by the user in the appointment table view.
onDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This event handler method deletes the Customer that has been selected by the user in the customer table view.
onExitProgram(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
This method is an event handler that exits the program when the exit button is clicked.
onReturnToMain(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
This event handler redirects the user to the Main View when the Return To main Button is Clicked.
onSelectAllRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This method populates the Appointment Table view with all appointments in the database when clicked.
onSelectAppointmentReport(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This method redirects users to the Reports view defined by Reports.fxml.
onSelectContact(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
This event handler method shows the total number of appointments booked for a selected contact.
onSelectCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
ADDITIONAL REPORT SELECTED BY STUDENT FOR SECTION 3f: This event handler method displays the total number of appointments booked for a selected customer.
onSelectExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This method allows users to exit the program.
onSelectMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
This event handler method displays the total number of appointments booked for a selected calendar Month.
onSelectMonthRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
LAMBDA USE: This method uses a lambda expression on a FilteredList to return a filtered list of Appointments that occur during the current calendar month.
onSelectType(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
This event handler method displays the total number of appointments booked for a selected appointment Type.
onSelectWeekRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
LAMBDA USE: This method uses a lambda expression on a FilteredList to return a filtered list of Appointments that occur within the following week of the current day.
onSignIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
When the 'Sign In' button is clicked, this method checks the input username against all usernames in the database.
onUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This method redirects users to the Update Appointment view defined by AddModifyAppointment.fxml.
onUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
This method redirects users to the Update Appointment view defined by AddModifyCustomer.fxml.
